Danessa Myricks Smoothing FX Refining Gel,  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Danessa Myricks Beauty

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Dimethicone / Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclomethicone / Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane / Cyclohexasiloxane, Acrylates / Dimethicone Copolymer/ Cyclopentasiloxane, Gold
book: 3051-Danessa Myricks Smoothing FX Refining Gel,  (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Apply a small amount of Smoothing effect over the entire face. Wear alone for a natural smooth matte appearance to the skin or apply under your favorite completion product.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 3051-Danessa Myricks Smoothing FX Refining Gel,  (2020 formulation)
